name: Kitchen Overlord's Illustrated Geek Cookbook
blurb: A lavishly illustrated, easy-to-use cookbook representing over 120 years of geek culture.

name: Tipsy Treats & Salty Sweets - A Guide To Drunk Baking
blurb: After many years of baking and creating recipes, I am putting them into a cookbook along with cocktails and liquor infusions to pair.

name: CUISINE OF THE SUN COOKBOOK
blurb: A Collection of Reimagined Provençal Recipes that will Bring a Ray of Sunshine to your Plate.

name: Buck, Buck, Moose: The Venison Cookbook
blurb: Buck, Buck, Moose will be a hardcover, full-color venison cookbook that will take you from nose to tail and around the world.

name: Look, Cook, and Eat
blurb: A digital how-to cooking magazine designed for those with intellectual disabilities to help promote an independent lifestyle.

name: Good and Cheap: Eat Well on $4/Day (the PDF is free!)
blurb: Good and Cheap is a gorgeous cookbook for tight budgets. It's free online—and the print version was Kickstarter's #1 cookbook ever.

name: Bowls of Love: Paleo Soups for the Seasons
blurb: Bowls of Love is a Paleo soup cookbook full of colorful, delicious, and healthy recipes for all of the seasons and people in your life.

name: The Kurochka Cookbook: A Book of Russian & Ukrainian Recipes
blurb: The Kurochka Cookbook is an illustrated collection of recipes, stories, trivia and tidbits about Russian & Ukrainian food and culture.

name: Myrtlewood - Home Cooking from the Pacific Northwest
blurb: A cookbook created in a home kitchen, using ingredients from a backyard garden, farmer's markets, and small shops.

name: Whovian Cookbook - Dining With the Doctor: Regenerated
blurb: A Doctor Who cookbook w/original recipes for every episode of series 1-8 + bonus chapters for Cocktails, Fish Fingers & Custard & More.

name: The 8x8 Cookbook--Square Meals for Weeknight Dinner
blurb: Getting a delicious "square meal" on your dinner table just got a whole lot easier!

name: Food That Works - Cookbook Tour!
blurb: Food That Works is a cookbook for busy people, with jobs. It organizes your fridge so healthy meals are available on the fly Mon.- Fri.

name: tonight at 7.30: one family's life at the table
blurb: A cookbook of mouthwatering dishes to feed family and friends, recipes by Kristen and delicious photographs by her daughter Avery.

name: Alta Editions: An Unconventional Cookbook
blurb: A pioneering digital cookbook featuring three rising star chefs. Join us as we work to evolve digital cookbooks beyond print replicas.

name: "Eat Like A Gilmore" Cookbook
blurb: Finally! A cookbook for people who truly "get" the Gilmore way of life - an unofficial cookbook for the fans of Gilmore Girls.

name: My Happy Plates
blurb: <3 food but struggle with what to cook? Customized weekly meal plans based on your family's eating profile + convenient shopping lists.

name: Indo Dutch Kitchen Secrets
blurb: An inspiring full-color, hardcover cookbook about a unique culinary heritage, told through a collection of delicious recipes & stories.

name: 40 Days of Green Smoothies in PRINT!
blurb: Help create a print version of 40 Days of Green Smoothies! Let's kickstart that green smoothie habit, y'all.

name: The Fun of Baking Bread! Bread Recipes for Bread Lovers.
blurb: A guide to baking glorious loaves for adventurous bread lovers. Impress your guests, teach your kids & never buy bagged bread again!

name: America's Kitchen Sink
blurb: My goal is to figure out how the USA really eats, one verbal recipe at a time.

name: Not For You: Family Narratives of Denial & Comfort Foods
blurb: Heirloom Indian recipes & comfort foods for the body, spirit & soul; inspired by real-life events about the strength of perseverance.

name: The Illustrated Wok: Chinese food like you've never seen
blurb: Celebrating the culinary diversity of Chinese cuisine with hand-illustrated recipes drawn from chefs around the world

name: Nomster Chef: Recipes that Help Kids Learn to Cook
blurb: Digital library of illustrated step-by-step recipes that help kids cook with their grown-ups for more healthy eating + fun family time!

name: The 2nd Unofficial Gilmore Girls Cookbook
blurb: A 2nd set of recipes from the show "Gilmore Girls" - the follow-up to "Eat Like A Gilmore". Scroll down to learn more.

name: Tchad: Cooking for Conservation
blurb: A cookbook with a mission to support the people and the organizations who protect Africa's vulnerable national parks.

name: Story & Recipes #Valeriescateyescream Graphic Art Cook Book
blurb: The Story and Recipes of Valerie's Cat Eye sCream! Is a hand drawn graphic art ice cream recipe cookbook & story of friendships.

name: The Easy Bake Unicorn Cookbook!
blurb: Easy Unicorn treats! This cookbook (made with my mom) gives you & your kids the chance to create your own rainbow colored masterpieces!

name: ckbk - the world's best cookbooks at your fingertips
blurb: Unlimited access to a curated collection of hundreds of the world's best cookbooks including more than 100,000 recipes

name: Restorative Kitchen: a book for healing and optimal wellness
blurb: A cookbook and lifestyle guide for preventing and reversing chronic disease and autoimmunity

name: de·lec·ta·ble: Ten Recipes from Around the World
blurb: Full-color recipe cards with ten delicious dishes from my travels around the world.

name: Cook Eat Slovenia – The Cookbook
blurb: A cookbook that brings traditional Slovenian recipes and family stories to your kitchens worldwide!

name: The SOLID Cookbook by Rob Dose & Solidteknics: Vol 1, 1st Ed
blurb: Solid recipes and meaningful stories shared by passionate Solid Cooks. Limited First Edition to pass down with your heirloom cookware.

name: Food by Bear: The Cookbook
blurb: The first eating manual from Cow by Bear, featuring recipes, advice and inspired stories from Chef Bear.

name: DENCH. The Cookbook
blurb: Recipes and stories from the pop-up restaurant started out of a college student's studio apartment!

name: Western Balkans Cookbook
blurb: The Western Balkans Cookbook will map the cuisines of the region and beyond, where the dishes are still prepared in a traditional way.

name: Wizarding Cookbook: Year One
blurb: ForeverMagic are looking to create a Cookbook for fans from the Harry Potter universe! A comprehensive book with beloved recipes!

name: The Unofficial Legend of Zelda Cookbook Break Kickstarter
blurb: It's dangerous to cook alone... Back this! 120+ recipes, growing with each new backer! Join to start Taste Testing & Questing today!

name: Kids In The Kitchen Project
blurb: Getting kids in the kitchen for whole food fun!

name: Vegan Ramen Cookbook by YouTube chef - Break Kickstarter!
blurb: From handmade noodles, to gyoza, takoyaki, and incredible ramen broths - learn to make it all in this unique Vegan Ramen Cookbook

name: Family Style Cookbook
blurb: Redesigning mom's recipes for a healthier plate.

name: MUNDEKULLA COOKS: Our Favourite Vegan & Vegetarian Recipes
blurb: From a magic place in the Swedish forest for music, peace and sustainability.

name: Recipes For Reciprocity (a regenerative recipe book)
blurb: A recipe book that also invites the reader to re-connect with the land their food comes from... a path to regeneration and abundance

name: PUNK NOODLE COOKBOOK
blurb: Stories and recipes from a pop-up noodle shop

name: Podere Il Casale
blurb: A cookbook about family, food and organic farming in the Tuscan countryside.

name: Pocket-sized cookbook: Elevated Outdoor Meals - MONTyBOCA
blurb: Fast, easy, healthy and tasty recipes for your next hike, camp, voyage or trek.

name: Very Travelicious | A culinary trip around the world
blurb: Travel the world from home. Discover new tastes and try out exotic recipes.

name: Makan at Mum's – A Family Cookbook
blurb: A recipe book to celebrate my mum's food and uphold her keenly developed cooking instincts – a family memento to pass down favourites

name: ANIME COOKBOOK WITH BAKING & DECORATED DESSERT RECIPES!
blurb: 80+ Baking & Decorated Dessert Recipes From Popular Anime Shows & Movies!

name: Pizza for Everyone
blurb: A retro church-style cookbook about the king of foods.

name: Vegan Serendib: A Sri Lankan American Cookbook
blurb: A vegan Sri Lankan cookbook, successor to A Feast of Serendib.

name: AniBites Vol 1&2!
blurb: Printed Versions of AniBites Vol. 1 & 2! I will be bringing them to life so you can have them next to all of your mangas!

name: The Landsknecht Cookbook
blurb: An authentic cookbook with over 50 recipes from the Landsknecht era.

name: Vegan Cookbooks with No Relation to Metallica or the Ramones
blurb: Hey Ho Let's Dough & Enter Sandwich are masterfully illustrated parodies and serious cookbooks by Automne Zingg and Joshua Ploeg

name: The Shire Cookbook | Rezepte aus dem Auenland
blurb: Recipes from a Halfling’s Kitchen | Das Halblings-Kochbuch

name: Our Country Cupboard Cookbook
blurb: 100 gluten-free recipes, everyone will love. Including 25 top secret seasoning mix recipes that make mealtime easy and delicious.
